short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Amazon reviews and include YouTube reviews.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Reviews Summary: Your AI-Powered Shopping Assistant

Make informed purchasing decisions on Amazon with our intelligent Chrome extension. 

Key Features:
✔️ Review Summaries: Get the gist of customer opinions at a glance.
✔️ YouTube Reviews: Watch video reviews without leaving the product page.
✔️ AI Chatbot: Ask product-specific questions and get instant, intelligent responses.

How it works:
1. Browse Amazon as usual
2. Click our extension icon on any product page
3. Instantly access summarized reviews, video content, and AI assistance

Save time, make better choices, and shop smarter with Amazon Reviews Summary. Your personal shopping expert is just a click away!

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Amazon.com, Inc.
